# Draft:Bulwark Exterminating

----
}}Bulwark Exterminating is an American pest control company headquartered in Mesa, Arizona. The company operates in twelve U.S. states and provides general pest management services, as well as treatments for termites and mosquitoes. Independent consumer publications have noted that the company’s service policies include a 60-day guarantee and an “anti-no-show” commitment.
History
Pest Control Technology has reported on Bulwark Exterminating as a pest management firm based in Mesa, Arizona, describing it as a company exceeding $20 million in annual revenue and pursuing growth through targeted acquisitions. In 2012, the company acquired Premier Pest Management, a Phoenix-area business with about $1 million in annual revenue, expanding its market presence in Arizona.
Operations and services
According to independent reviews, Bulwark Exterminating offers annual service plans addressing common household pests, with separate programs for mosquito and termite control. Termite control is typically provided using bait systems or liquid barrier treatments, and general pest services target ants, cockroaches, crickets, earwigs, rodents, spiders, ticks, and wasps. Bed bug treatments are available in select service areas.
Locations
Consumer sources list the company’s operations in twelve states: Arizona, Georgia, Missouri, New Mexico, Nevada, North Carolina, Oklahoma, South Carolina, Tennessee, Texas, Utah, and Washington.
Recognition
Bulwark Exterminating has been included in Energage’s Top Workplaces listings at national and regional levels, which identify Mesa, Arizona, as the company’s headquarters. The Better Business Bureau lists the company as accredited since 2000, with a primary office in Mesa.
Reception
Consumer publications such as This Old House, Today’s Homeowner, and Forbes Home have reviewed Bulwark Exterminating’s services, describing its coverage area, policies, and approach in comparison with larger national providers.
